alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CATTARAUGUS COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashford Hollow, or 13 miles north of Salamanca, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashford, Ashford Hollow, Great Valley, East Otto, Cattaraugus, Otto, Humphrey, Ellicottville, Cattaraugus County Landfill, and West Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
